# Commons-Box [![Discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/719922452259668000.svg?color=7289DA&label=discord)](https://discord.gg/Vhyy4HA)
Commons Box is a open-source library that provides utilities needed for Java and Minecraft.

## Want to contribute in this project?
[**ðŸ’£ Issues Reporting (Discord)**](https://discordapp.com/invite/Vhyy4HA)

## Maven repo [![](https://jitpack.io/v/Despical/Commons-Box.svg)](https://jitpack.io/#Despical/Commons-Box)
Add repository
```xml
    <repositories>
        <repository>
            <id>jitpack.io</id>
            <url>https://jitpack.io</url>
        </repository>
    </repositories>
```
Then add the dependency
```xml
    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.github.Despical</groupId>
            <artifactId>Commons-Box</artifactId>
            <version>1.1.1</version>
            <scope>compile</scope>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>
```
